rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall with traditional Chettinad motifs.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area decorated in Chettinad style with natural light and elegant interiors.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; designed for comfortable family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen integrated with traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom and peaceful ambiance in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room reflecting Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: Quiet study area with ample natural light and traditional decor.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A designated space for servants maintaining privacy and efficiency.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace with open space, seating areas and a water feature, designed for relaxation and occasional gatherings.
